pros: Has increased inventory space from Master of Organization
cons: Lacks mobility compared to other classes
Requires the use of Bullets as ammo
Lots of RNG with Scurvy Summons, Roll of the Dice, and Broadside

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Pirate to reach Master Level
The stats are affected by %Stat bonuses

[Note]: Link Skill has a togglable effect where you can swap all STR + %STR into DEX + %DEX and vice versa
  • Double-click the Link Skill to turn this effect on/off
  • The effect only applies to the original Link Skill, not the transferred version

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Pirate, fancy and unique' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Pirate, talk to Kyrin to accept a quest called 'Gunslinger of the Seven Seas'. Completing the quest will make you a Gunslinger and you will be on the path to a Corsair. Gunslinger is the 2nd job of Corsair

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Rapid Fire - Reinforce and Boss Rush
  • Brain Scrambler - Reinforce, Extra Strike, and Boss Rush

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Huynni for their help in making this overview!

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Master of Swimming
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases swimming speed and prevents HP loss when swimming.

primary.name: Master of Organization
primary.shortDesc: Permanently expands Equip, Use, Set-up, and Etc. Inventory.

primary.name: Sommersault Kick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 305%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Perform a kick in front of you

primary.name: Double Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 165%, Range: 380
primary.desc: Fires two bullets at a single enemy

primary.name: Octopush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Dash
primary.shortDesc: Dash, MP Cost: 1, Duration: Up to 10 sec., Movement Speed: +50, Jump: +20, Knockback Resistance: +100%
primary.desc: Double-tap the Left or Right Arrow Keys to start sprinting to increase Movement Speed and Jump
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys
While sprinting, you cannot be knocked back

primary.name: Shadow Heart
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Bullet Time
primary.shortDesc: Max Movement Speed: +20, Jump: +10

primary.name: Triple Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 201%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Increases the %Damage and number of shots fired by

primary.name: Scurvy Summons
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Crewman Damage: 230%, Duration: 120 sec, Cooldown 120 sec
primary.desc: Summons one of three crew members to fight alongside you
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Rapid Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 165%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Rapidly fires several shots at multiple enemies

primary.name: Recoil Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 300%
primary.desc: Fires a single shot that pushes you backward

primary.name: Gun Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Gun Attack Speed increased for 180 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Wings
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10
primary.desc: Launches you up into the air
details: Holding the Skill Key will allow you to glide after using the skill
Can be used in the air

primary.name: Infinity Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20 and 100 bullets, Duration: 180 sec
primary.desc: Allows you to use your skills without consuming any Bullets

primary.name: Gun Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Gun Mastery: +50%, Ammo: +200
details: Additionally increases the max number of charges each Ammo slot can hold

primary.name: Physical Trianing
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Strength by 30 and DEX by +30\nPermanently decreases Damage Taken by 20%

primary.name: Blunderblaster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32 and 2 bullets, Damage: 480%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Fires a blast of bullets forward

primary.name: Blackboot Bill
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 734%, Knockback Range: 400
primary.desc: Fires a giant bullet that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Octo-Cannon
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, Octopus Damage: 300%, Summon Duration: 30 sec, Cooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Summons a cannon that attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Roll of the Dice
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Buff Duration: 180, Cooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Grants a buff depending on the number rolled
details: [One]: Reduces cooldown of
[Two]: Increases %DEF
[Three]: Increases %Max HP/MP
[Four]: Increases %Crit Rate
[Five]: Increases %Damage
[Six]: Increases %EXP Rate

primary.name: Cross Cut Blast
primary.shortDesc: Attack +60

primary.name: Outlaw's Code
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +20%, Max HP/MP: +600

primary.name: Fullmetal Jacket
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: 20%, Critical Rate: +30%, Enemy DEF Ignored: 20%

primary.name: All Aboard
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Summons two brave crew members to assist you in battle, Summon Duration: 120 sec, Cooldown: 120 sec.
Crew members deal increased damage
Murat - Damage: 500%
Valerie - Damage: 560%
Jack - Damage: 320%
Cutter - Damage: 480%
If you're targeted by an abnormal status, a crew member will block it. That crew member cannot block another status effect until re-summoned.
primary.desc: Increases the %Damage of and allows you to summon two crew members at once
details: Crew members can also block an Abnormal Status per each summon
Additionally, adds a new crew member who throws bombs, Cutter

primary.name: Rapid Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 9, Damage: 325% per shot
primary.desc: Fires a flurry of bullets in front of you
details: You can move while casting
Not affected by Attack Speed

primary.name: Brain Scrambler
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 525%, Number of Attacks: 12, Enemy DEF Ignored: 60%, Bonus Critical Chance: 100%\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Fires a powerful shot at a single enemy
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

primary.name: Parrotargetting
primary.shortDesc: MP 37 consumed, 610% damage, final damage increased by 25% when attacking targeted monster\n[Passive Effect: Critical Damage +20%]
primary.desc: Throws a parrot egg that debuffs an enemy
details: [Debuff]: Attacks against this enemy deal increased %Final Damage
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Eight-Legs Easton
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Bullets Consumed: 4, Damage: 649%, Max Enemies Attacked: 8, Number of Attacks: 4.\n[Passive Effect : Battleship Nautilus's skill damage +130% points.]
primary.desc: Fires a barrage of bullets forward
details: [Passive]: Increases %p Damage of Nautilus Strike
If used while pressing the Down Arrow Key, the attack range will be reduced, but you will be immune to knockbacks

primary.name: Broadside
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150, Fires cannon at a set rate for 60 sec, Fired cannon explodes when enemy is touched, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3, Max of 2 summoned.
Cooldown: 30 sec
Dondlass: Damage: 330%, Attack Speed: Normal, Range: Normal
Black Bark: Damage: 445%, Attack Speed: Slow, Range: Normal
Shulynch: Damage: 200%, Attack Speed: Fast, Range: Normal
Jonathan: Damage: 320%, Attack Speed: Normal, Range: Long
primary.desc: Summons a battleship with a random crew member on board that fires bombs at nearby enemies
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with Ahoy Mateys
Based on whichever crew member that appears, the damage, rate of fire, and range will differ
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Nautilus Strike
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, Damage: 440%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7
Cooldown: 30 sec
Upon use, remaining Cooldown -50% for Scurvy Summons, Roll of the Dice, and Broadside
Majestic Presence's final damage +30% during Cooldown
primary.desc: Launches a massive attack that hits a large area
details: While Nautilus Strike is on cooldown, increases the %Final Damage of Majestic Presence explosion attack
When used, reduces remaining cooldown of , , and slightly
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Quickdraw
primary.shortDesc: When used, the Final Damage of your next eligible attack skill increases by 25%. Must be readied prior to use.\n[Passive Effect: Your attacks have a 8% chance to ready Quickdraw for use.]
details: [Passive]: Your attacks have a chance to ready Quickdraw for you

[Active]: When used, your next attack will deal increased %Final Damage
  • Can only be used when the skill is readied
  • and Bullet Barrage (5th Job) cannot trigger the damage bonus

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Jolly Roger
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Duration: 180 sec, Attack Power: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +60%, reduces Avoidability.

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Pirate's Revenge
primary.shortDesc: Chance: 40%, Damage: +15%, Duration: 45 sec, will also activate for attacks that deal damage in proportion to maximum HP.\n[Passive Effect: Damage Taken: -15%]
primary.desc: When damaged, you have a chance to gain a %Damage buff
details: [Passive]: Increases %Damage Reduction

primary.name: Double Down
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, 50% chance of rolling a Double Down, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
details: Grants a chance to roll two dices at once

primary.name: Ahoy Mateys
primary.shortDesc:
Final Crewman Damage: +15%, When a crewman is summoned: Attack Power +45
[Unique effects for each crewman]
Murat: Critical Damage +5%
Valerie: Critical Rate +10%
Jack: HP/MP +30%, Speed +30
Cutter: Incoming damage -15%
[Passive Effect: Max HP +5000, Critical Damage +25%]
primary.desc: Increases the %Final Damage of and grants a unique buff based on which crew member is summoned
details:
Additionally grants flat Attack when is active:
  • [Murat]: Increases %Crit Damage
  • [Valerie]: Increases %Crit Rate
  • [Jack]: Increases %Max HP/MP and Movement Speed
  • [Cutter]: Increases %Damage Reduction
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Damage and grants flat Max HP

primary.name: Majestic Presence
primary.shortDesc: Gun Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30\n[Final Attack Skills] 275% additional explosion damage upon performing a shot-firing attack.
primary.desc: Your shot-firing attacks deal an additional explosive attack
details: Additionally increases %Gun Mastery, and grants flat Attack

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Saving Grace
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When Double Down does not activate, there is a 40% chance for the cooldown to not apply. The next cast after this will activate Double Down with 4 or above.

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Addition
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Lucky number 7 added to Double Down

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases the chances of rolling a 4, 5, or 6 in Roll of the Dice.

hyperActive.name: Whaler's Potion
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, HP Recovered: 99% of max HP, Damage Taken: -15% for 120 sec\nCooldown: 120 sec\n[Passive Effect: Status Resistance +15, Elemental Resistance +15%, Critical Rate +10%]

hyperActive.name: Ugly Bomb
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 15 \nCooldown: 15 sec
hyperActive.desc: Drops a massive bomb in front of you

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Bullet Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500 per second, Duration: 6, periodically deals 455% damage 5 times on up to 15 enemies\nMash the attack key to increase the skill duration by up to 6 sec\nCooldown: 75 sec
fifthMain.desc: Wildy fires bullets in all directions
details: Continuously pressing the Attack Key will increase the duration of the attack
You can use mobility skills, however not gliding while casting
Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the attack

fifthMain.name: Target Lock
fifthMain.shortDesc: [Passive Effect] Focuses aim on up to 12 enemies within range whenever skill is not in cooldown. Aiming process resets if skill is activated when the target is locked.\n[Active Effect] MP Cost: 850, Targeted enemies take 1600% damage 6 times, at +100% Critical Rate. Deals extra damage for Target Locks. Bonus stacks up to 3x.\nCooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Fires devastating shots at marked targets
details: While Target Lock is not on cooldown, targets in range are randomly marked for the attack

The target will blink 3 times before selecting a new target
  • If you activate Target Lock while on the last blink, it will deal extra damage

You are invincible while casting
  • Depending on the number of blinks, the invincibility time will increase
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Nautilus Assault
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Invincible while casting
Ship Attack: The ship attacks at set intervals. Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 6, Ship Attack Activation Count: 7
Volley: Fires a volley at set intervals. Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 12, Volley Activation Count: 36
Cooldown: 180 sec
When either Nautilus Strike or Nautilus Assault is used, a cooldown of 8 sec is applied, but it won't be applied if another cooldown longer than that time is already applied.
fifthMain.desc: Summons the Nautilus to launch an assault
details: The ship and assault both deal damage
If either or are used, there is a short cooldown (8 secs) before either can activated unless they are already on cooldown
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Death Trigger
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750. Fires up to 7 shots, which attack up to 7 enemies with 650% damage 7 time(s).\nCooldown: 45 sec. Cooldown decreases by 0.5 sec. for each remaining ricochet.
fifthMain.desc: Fires several bullets that ricochets to multiple enemies
details: If there is an enemy affected by the debuff, all bullets will target that enemy
Cooldown decreases depending on the number of remaining ricochets
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Corsair is a DEX pirate class part of the Explorers class group. Corsairs have many summons that help fight alongside you. Additionally, Corsairs consume Bullets as ammo for their attacks
